III Semester

				Programming in C++ and Data Structures 
				Microprocessors and its Applications 
				Numerical and Statistical Methods 
				Prog in C++ using Data Structures (Practical) 
				Financial Accounting 
				Soft Skill - Spoken and Presentation Skills Level I 
				Environmental Studies (Exam in IV Sem) 

IV Semester 

				Programming in Java 
				Operating System 
				Computer Graphics 
				Java Programming Lab (Practical) 
				Cost and Management Accounting 
				Soft Skills - Spoken and Presentation Skills Level II 
				Environmental Studies
